title: An excellent new commedie intitutled, The conflict of conscience contayninge a most lamentable example of the dolefull desperation of a miserable worldlinge, termed by the name of Philologus, who forsooke the trueth of Gods gospel for feare of the losse of lyfe & worldly goods / compiled by Nathaniell Woodes, minister in Norwich ...
author: Woodes, Nathaniel, fl. 1580.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Richard Bradocke dwelling in Aldermanburie, a little aboue the Conduict,
